summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the TensorFlow implementation of the Wav2Vec2 speech model, covering configuration loading, forward pass signatures, hidden state outputs, embedding handling, training loops, inference with CTC loss, dataset conversion, token embedding resizing, pretrained weight loading, and equivalence with the PyTorch version.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the TF Wav2Vec2 model for production speech‑recognition pipelines, enabling reliable deployment, maintenance, and cross‑framework compatibility.
